items.preText: Syed Kabir: "Good comeback by WI. Soumya Sarkar keeps getting out predictably to premeditated shots. He shouldve known there was a fielder right there for his signature ramp shot."
items.text: full, angled in, clipped to long-on
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: short, wide, slaps it hard through cover
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: critical no-ball, denies him a wicket. Oversteps before bowling this short of a length, pulled away to midwicket who arches back and snares it over his head
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 no ball

items.text: maximises the free-hit.. poor delivery. Shortish, angled across on off, rocks back and pulls over deep midwicket for his fifty
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, SIX runs

items.text: back of a length, angled across giving him too much room, slapped through point
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: short on off, pulled to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Thomas to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, driven to cover
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: comes down to a shortish one that angles in and beats the edge as he swings
items.shortText: Thomas to Liton Das, no run

items.text: ffull, angled in, clipped between deep midwicket and long-on
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 2 runs
Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, slow and shaping away outside off, has a gentle feel for it and gets beaten
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, no run

items.text: drills a fuller one away to deep point
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, 1 run

items.text: full toss, swung across to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Paul to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: back of a length, swings across the line but this one's a little wide of him and he miscues it off the toe-end to deep square leg who takes a well-judged catch
items.shortText: Paul to Liton Das, OUT

dismissal.text: Liton Das c Hetmyer b Paul 8 (14b 1x4 0x6) SR: 57.14

items.text: short of length, slower as he swings across the line and misses as the ball doesn't bounce
items.shortText: Roach to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: back of a length, slow again and he moves too far away as he swings and misses
items.shortText: Roach to Mashrafe Mortaza, no run

items.text: another slower ball, angles in and pings the thigh as he pulls early
items.shortText: Roach to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 leg bye

items.text: slower ball again, steps down the ground and slaps at it but misses
items.shortText: Roach to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: shuffles across and makes use of the angle to paddle it fine leg
items.shortText: Roach to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: slower ball, off cutter, swings early with the pull and the ball goes past the under edge to clatter into the stumps
items.shortText: Roach to Shakib Al Hasan, OUT

dismissal.text: Shakib Al Hasan  b Roach 65 (62b 6x4 1x6) SR: 104.83

items.text: swings hard at a fuller one outside off and gets an inside edge to backward square leg
items.shortText: Paul to Mashrafe Mortaza, 1 run

items.text: full outside off, inside-edged to deep fine leg
items.shortText: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: driven to cover who dives to his left and half-stops it
items.shortText: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 2 runs

items.text: leans into a drive and carves it away through the covers, beating the fielder giving it chase
items.shortText: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, FOUR runs

items.preText: Reshad: "This is excellent bowling by Windies bowlers. They varied the pace and length, took wickets in regular intervals. Bangladesh at one point was in a position to score 300 but looks like they will score hardly 255. "
items.text: tucks a length ball to midwicket
items.shortText: Paul to Mehidy Hasan Miraz, 1 run
